vernac_cmds: Require Import Arith NPeano List Bool Psatz.
Notation wf := (CBV_cache.wf variable_eq_dec function_eq_dec constructor_eq_dec rule_default prog max_arity).

Inductive product {A: Type} (R : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := | product_conseq : forall x y xs ys, x = y -> product R xs ys -> product R (x::xs) (y::ys) | product_consst : forall x y xs ys, R x y -> Forall2 (clos_refl R) xs ys -> product R (x::xs) (y::ys).

Inductive PPO: term -> term -> Prop := | ppo_constr_in : forall s c lt, In s lt -> PPO s (capply c lt) | ppo_fun_in : forall s f lt, In s lt -> PPO s (fapply f lt) | ppo_constr_sub : forall s t c lt, In t lt -> PPO s t -> PPO s (capply c lt) | ppo_fun_sub : forall s t f lt, In t lt -> PPO s t -> PPO s (fapply f lt) | ppo_constr_split : forall c ls f lt, (forall s, In s ls -> PPO s (fapply f lt)) -> PPO (capply c ls) (fapply f lt) | ppo_funlt_split : forall g ls f lt, rank g < rank f -> (forall s, In s ls -> PPO s (fapply f lt)) -> PPO (fapply g ls) (fapply f lt) | ppo_funeqv_split : forall g ls f lt, rank g = rank f -> product PPO ls lt -> PPO (fapply g ls) (fapply f lt).
Definition lt_wf_rect (n : nat) (P : nat -> Type) (F : forall n, (forall m, m < n -> P m) -> P n) : P n := well_founded_induction_type (well_founded_ltof nat (fun m => m)) P F n.

case_eq (term_beq variable_eq_dec function_eq_dec constructor_eq_dec t1 t2); intro H; [ left | right]; rewrite <- (term_beq_eq variable_eq_dec function_eq_dec constructor_eq_dec); [exact H | congruence ].
Lemma Exists_dec_gen : forall {A : Type} (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, In x l -> {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {Exists P l} + {~ Exists P l}.
induction l as [ | x l IH ].
Lemma Forall_dec_gen : forall {A : Type} (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, In x l -> {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {Forall P l} + {~ Forall P l}.
induction l as [ | x' l' IH ]; [ intros; left; constructor | ].
assert (Hx' : {P x'} + {~ P x'}) by now apply Hx'l'; left.
assert (Hl' : forall x : A, In x l' -> {P x} + {~ P x}) by now intros; apply Hx'l'; right.
elim Hx'; elim Hl'; intros H'x' H'l'; [ now left; constructor | | | ]; now right; intros Hfor; inversion Hfor.
Lemma Forall2_dec_gen : forall {A B : Type} (R : A -> B -> Prop) (xs : list A) (ys : list B), (forall x y, In x xs -> In y ys -> {R x y}+{~R x y}) -> {Forall2 R xs ys}+{~Forall2 R xs ys}.
induction xs as [ | x xs IH ].
case ys; intros; [ left; constructor | right; intros Hfor; inversion Hfor ].
intros ys; case ys; clear ys; [ now intros; right; intros Hfor; inversion Hfor | ].
assert (Hxy : {R x y} + {~ R x y}) by now apply Hxxsyys; left.
assert (Hxsys : {Forall2 R xs ys} + {~ Forall2 R xs ys}) by now apply IH; intros; apply Hxxsyys; right.
elim Hxy; elim Hxsys; intros H'xsys H'xy; [ now left; constructor | | | ] ; now right; intros Hfor; inversion Hfor.
Lemma clos_refl_dec {A : Type} (A_dec : forall x y:A, {x=y}+{x<>y}) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (R_dec : {R x y}+{~R x y}) : {clos_refl R x y}+{~(clos_refl R) x y}.
destruct (A_dec x y) as [ Heq | Hneq ].

Lemma product_dec (A : Type) (A_dec : forall x y:A, {x=y}+{x<>y}) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (xs ys : list A) (R_dec : forall x y, In x xs -> In y ys -> {R x y}+{~R x y}) : {product R xs ys}+{~product R xs ys}.
induction xs as [ | x xs IH ]; intros ys R_dec.
destruct (A_dec x y) as [ Heq | Hneq ].
Lemma PPO_dec t1 t2: {PPO t1 t2}+{~PPO t1 t2}.
remember (term_size t1 + term_size t2) as whole_size eqn: H_size.
induction whole_size as [ whole_size IH ] using lt_wf_rect.
intros [ x | c lt | f lt ] [ x' | c' lt' | f' lt' ] H_size; try (right; intro Hppo; inversion Hppo; fail).
destruct (@in_dec term term_dec (var x) lt') as [ Hin | Hnotin ].
eelim (Exists_dec_gen (fun t => PPO (var x) t) lt' _).
destruct (@in_dec term term_dec (var x) lt') as [ Hin | Hnotin ].
destruct (@in_dec term term_dec (capply c lt) lt') as [ Hin | Hnotin ].
destruct (@in_dec term term_dec (capply c lt) lt') as [ Hin | Hnotin ].
eelim (Forall_dec_gen (fun t => PPO t (fapply f' lt')) lt _).
destruct (@in_dec term term_dec (fapply f lt) lt') as [ Hin | Hnotin ].
destruct (@in_dec term term_dec (fapply f lt) lt') as [ Hin | Hnotin ].
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec (rank f) (rank f')) as [ [ Hlt | Heq ] | Hgt ].
eelim (Forall_dec_gen (fun t => PPO t (fapply f' lt')) lt _).
inversion Hppo; [ tauto | firstorder | tauto | omega ].
apply plus_lt_compat; simpl; apply le_lt_n_Sm, in_le_suml; rewrite in_map_iff; eexists; tauto.
inversion Hppo; [ tauto | firstorder | omega | tauto ].
inversion Hppo; [ tauto | firstorder | omega | omega ].
Lemma product_length A (R: A -> A -> Prop) xs ys : product R xs ys -> length xs = length ys.
induction H as [ x y xs ys H1 H2 IH | x y xs ys H1 H2 ].
Lemma product_Forall2 A (R: A -> A -> Prop) ls lt : product R ls lt -> Forall2 (clos_refl R) ls lt.
Lemma product_Exists2 A (R: A -> A -> Prop) ls lt : product R ls lt -> Exists2 R ls lt.
Definition PPO_rule (r: rule) : Prop := match r with | rule_intro f lp t => PPO t (fapply f (map (@term_from_pattern _ _ _) lp)) end.
Definition PPO_prog : Prop := forall r, In r prog -> PPO_rule r.
Lemma value_PPO_function (v: value) (f: function) (lt: list term) : PPO (@term_from_value _ _ _ v) (fapply f lt).

Lemma product_trans (A: Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) lt1 lt2 lt3 : (forall t1 t2 t3, In t1 lt1 -> In t2 lt2 -> In t3 lt3 -> R t1 t2 -> R t2 t3 -> R t1 t3) -> product R lt1 lt2 -> product R lt2 lt3 -> product R lt1 lt3.
assert (length lt1 = length lt2) as Hlen12.
assert (length lt2 = length lt3) as Hlen23.
induction H23 as [ Ba t23 lt2 lt3 Be H_prod23 IH | t2 t3 lt2 lt3 HR23 HForall23 ]; intros lt1 H_R Hlen12 H12.
inversion H12 as [ Ba Bb lt1' Bd Be H_prod12 Bg Bh | t1 Bb lt1' Bd HR12 HForall12 Bg Bh ]; subst; rename lt1' into lt1.
intros t1 t2 t3 H_In1 H_In2 H_In3.
intros t1' t2; intros; apply clos_refl_trans with (t2:=t2); trivial.
inversion H12 as [ Ba Bb lt1' Bd Be Hprod12 Bg Bh | t1 Bb lt1' Bd HR12 HForall12 Bg Bh ]; subst; rename lt1' into lt1.
intros t1' t2' t3' Hin1' Hin2' Hin3' [ HR12' | Heq12'] [ HR23' | Heq23' ]; subst; unfold clos_refl; try tauto.
apply (H_R t1' t2' t3'); trivial; simpl; tauto.
apply (H_R t1 t2 t3); simpl; tauto.
intros t1' t2' t3' Hin1' Hin2' Hin3' [ HR12' | Heq12'] [ HR23' | Heq23' ]; subst; unfold clos_refl; try tauto.
apply (H_R t1' t2' t3'); trivial; simpl; tauto.
Lemma PPO_trans t1 t2 t3 : PPO t1 t2 -> PPO t2 t3 -> PPO t1 t3.
remember (term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size t3) as whole_size eqn: H_size.
induction whole_size as [ whole_size IH ] using lt_wf_ind.
intros t1 t2 t3 H_size H12 H23.

inversion H23 as [ Ba c3 lt3 Hin3 Be Bf | Ba f3 lt3 Hin3 Be Bf | Ba t3' c3 lt3 Hin3 Hppo23 Bg Bh | Ba t3' f3 lt3 Hin3 Hppo23 Bg Bh | c2 lt2 f3 lt3 Hppo23 Bf Bg | f2 lt2 f3 lt3 Hrk23 Hppo23 Bg Bh | f2 lt2 f3 lt3 Hrk23 Hprodppo23 Bg Bh ]; subst.
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size t3') (t2 := t2); auto.
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size t3') (t2 := t2); auto.
inversion H12 as [ | | Ba t2 Bc Bd Hin2 Hppo12 Bg Bh | | | | ]; subst; auto.
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2 := t2); auto.
inversion H12 as [ | Ba Bb Bc Hin1 Be Bf | | Ba t2 Bc Bd Hin2 Hppo12 Bg Bh | c1 lt1 Bc Bd Hppolt1f2 Bf Bg | f1 lt1 Bc Bd Hrk12 Hppolt1f2 Bg Bh | f1 lt1 Bc Bd Hrk12 Hprodppo12 Bg Bh ]; subst.
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2 := t2); auto.
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size (fapply f2 lt2) + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2 := fapply f2 lt2); auto.
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size (fapply f2 lt2) + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2:=fapply f2 lt2); auto.
apply Forall2_In_l with (x := t1) in Hprodppo12; trivial.
destruct Hprodppo12 as ( t2 & Hin2 & [ Hppo12 | Heq12 ] ).
apply IH with (m:= term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2 := t2); eauto.
inversion H12 as [ | Ba Bb Bc Hin1 Be Bf | | Ba t2 Bc Bd Hin2 Hppo12 Bg Bh | c1 lt1 Bc Bd Hppolt1f2 Bf Bg | f1 lt1 Bc Bd Hrk12 Hppolt1f2 Bg Bh | f1 lt1 Bc Bd Hrk12 Hprodppo12 Bg Bh ]; subst.
apply Forall2_In_l with (x := t1) in Hprodppo23; trivial.
destruct Hprodppo23 as (t3 & Hin3 & [ Hppo13 | Heq13 ] ).
apply Forall2_In_l with (x := t2) in Hprodppo23; trivial.
destruct Hprodppo23 as (t3 & Hin3 & [ Hppo23 | Heq23 ] ).
apply IH with (m := term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size t3) (t2 := t2); trivial.
apply IH with (m := term_size t1 + term_size (fapply f2 lt2) + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2 := fapply f2 lt2); trivial.
apply IH with (m := term_size t1 + term_size (fapply f2 lt2) + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) (t2 := fapply f2 lt2); trivial.
intros t1 t2 t3 Hin1 Hin2 Hin3 Hppo12 Hppo23.
apply IH with (t2 := t2) (m := term_size t1 + term_size t2 + term_size t3); trivial.
Lemma PPO_trans_eq t1 t2 t3 : clos_refl PPO t1 t2 -> PPO t2 t3 -> PPO t1 t3.
Lemma PPO_trans_eq_r t1 t2 t3 : PPO t1 t2 -> clos_refl PPO t2 t3 -> PPO t1 t3.
Lemma PPO_asym t1 t2 : PPO t1 t2 -> ~ PPO t2 t1.
remember (term_size t1 + term_size t2) as whole_size eqn: H_size.
induction whole_size as [ whole_size IH ] using lt_wf_ind.
intros t1 t2 H_size Hppo12 Hppo21.
destruct t1 as [ x | c lt | f lt ].
inversion Hppo21 as [ Ba Bb Bc Hin Be Bf | | aa t ac ad Hin Hppo ag ah | | | | ]; subst.
inversion Hppo12 as [ aa c2 lt2 Hin2 ae af | aa f2 lt2 Hin2 ae af | aa t3 c3 lt3 Hin3 Hppo3 ag ah | aa t3 f3 lt3 Hin3 Hppo3 ag ah | aa ab f3 lt3 Hall af ag | | ] ; subst.
apply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size (capply c lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
apply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size (capply c lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
assert (PPO t3 (capply c lt)) as Hppo.
apply PPO_trans with (t2 := capply c3 lt3); trivial.
eapply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size t3) in Hppo; try tauto; try ring.
assert (PPO t3 (capply c lt)) as Hppo.
apply PPO_trans with (t2 := fapply f3 lt3); trivial.
eapply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size t3) in Hppo; try tauto; try ring.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f3 lt3) + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) in Hin; trivial.
assert (PPO (fapply f3 lt3) (fapply f3 lt3)) as H.
apply PPO_trans with (capply c lt); trivial.
inversion Hppo12 as [ aa c2 lt2 Hin2 ae af | aa f2 lt2 Hin2 ae af | aa t3 c3 lt3 Hin3 Hppo3 ag ah | aa t3 f3 lt3 Hin3 Hppo3 ag ah | aa ab f3 lt3 Hall af ag | | ]; subst.
apply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size (capply c lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
apply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size (capply c lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
assert (PPO t3 (capply c lt)) as Hppo'.
apply PPO_trans with (t2 := capply c3 lt3); trivial.
apply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size t3) in Hppo'; try tauto; try ring.
assert (PPO t3 (capply c lt)) as Hppo'.
apply PPO_trans with (t2 := fapply f3 lt3); trivial.
apply IH with (m := term_size (capply c lt) + term_size t3) in Hppo'; try tauto; try ring.
apply IH with (m := term_size t + term_size (fapply f3 lt3)) in Hin; trivial; try tauto.
inversion Hppo21 as [ | aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t3 ac ad Hin Hppo ag ah | c3 lt3 ac ad Hall af ag | f3 lt3 ac ad Hrank Hall ag ah | f3 lt3 ac ad Hrank Hprod ag ah ]; subst.
apply IH with (m := term_size t2 + term_size t2) in Hppo11; try tauto.
apply ppo_fun_in with (f := f) in Hin.
eapply IH in Hppo32; try tauto; try reflexivity.
inversion Hppo12 as [ aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t3 ac ad Hin Hppo ag ah | | | | ]; subst; try omega.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f lt) + term_size (fapply f lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
apply ppo_constr_in with (c := c3) in Hin.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f lt) + term_size t3)in Hppo31; try tauto; try ring.
inversion Hppo12 as [ | aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t3 ac ad Hin Hppo ag ah | | | ]; subst; try omega.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f lt) + term_size (fapply f lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
apply ppo_fun_in with (f := f3) in Hin.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f lt) + term_size t3)in Hppo31; try tauto; try ring.
inversion Hppo12 as [ | aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t3 ac ad Hin Hppo ag ah | | | aa ab ac ad Hrank' Hprodrev ag ah ]; subst; try omega.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f lt) + term_size (fapply f lt)) in Hppo11; try tauto.
apply ppo_fun_in with (f := f3) in Hin.
apply IH with (m := term_size (fapply f lt) + term_size t3)in Hppo31; try tauto; try ring.
destruct Hprod as ( i & Hlen & Hppoi ).
apply (Forall2_forall term_default) with (i := i) in Hprodrev; trivial.
apply IH with (m := term_size (nth i lt3 term_default) + term_size (nth i lt term_default)) in Hppoi; trivial; try tauto.
apply IH with (m := term_size (nth i lt3 term_default) + term_size (nth i lt term_default)) in Hppoi; trivial.
Lemma PPO_term_pattern_subst p t s : PPO t (@term_from_pattern _ _ _ p) -> PPO (subst s t) (@term_from_value _ _ _ (psubst s p)).
induction p as [ v | c lp IH ] using pattern_ind2; intros t s Hppo; [ solve [inversion Hppo] | idtac ].
inversion Hppo as [ aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t' ac ad Hin Hppo' ag ah | | | | ]; subst.
Lemma fapply_not_PPO_value f lt v : term_value v -> ~ PPO (fapply f lt) v.
induction v as [ | c lv IH | f' lt' ] using term_ind2; intros f lt Hval Hppo; simpl in Hval; try tauto.
rewrite <- forall_andl in Hval; rewrite Forall_forall in Hval.
inversion Hppo as [ Ba Bb Bc Hin Be Bf | | Ba v Bc Bd Hin Hpposub Bg Bh | | | | ]; subst.
Lemma fapply_not_PPO_pattern f lt p : ~ PPO (fapply f lt) (@term_from_pattern _ _ _ p).
induction p as [ v | c lp IH ] using pattern_ind2; intros f lt Hppo; [ solve [ inversion Hppo ] | idtac ].
inversion Hppo as [ aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t ac ad Hin Hppo' ag ah | | | | ]; subst.
destruct Hin as ( p & Heq & Hin ).
Lemma PPO_rule_PPO_instance s f lp t : PPO_rule (rule_intro f lp t) -> PPO (subst s t) (fapply f (map (@term_from_value _ _ _) (map (psubst s) lp))).
induction t as [ x | c lt IH | g lt IH ] using term_ind2; intro Hppo.
apply PPO_trans with (capply c lt); trivial.
inversion Hppo as [ | aa ab ac Hin ae af | | aa t ac ad Hin Hppo' ag ah | | aa ab ac ad Hrank Hppo' ag ah | aa ab ac ad Hrank Hproduct ag ah]; clear Hppo; subst.
destruct p; simpl in Heq; congruence.
induction lt as [ | t lt IH ]; intros lp Hproduct; try solve[inversion Hproduct].
destruct lp as [ | p lp ]; try solve[inversion Hproduct].
inversion Hproduct as [ aa ab ac ad ae Hproduct' ag ah | aa ab ac ad Hppo Hforall ag ah ]; clear Hproduct; subst.
change ( Forall2 (clos_refl PPO) (map (subst s) lt) (map (@term_from_value _ _ _) (map (psubst s) lp)) ).
induction lt as [ | t' lt IH ]; intros lp Hforall; destruct lp as [ | p' lp ]; trivial; try solve[inversion Hforall].
inversion Hforall as [ | aa ab ac ad Hclos Hforall' ag ah ]; subst.
Lemma PPO_rule_instance i s p c1 t c2 v : PPO_prog -> wf (cbv_update i s p c1 t c2 v) -> PPO (proj_left p) t.
destruct Hwf as (_ & lp & t & Hi & Hrule & Heqlt & Heqp_l & _).
Definition activation_rank (p : cbv) : nat := match p with | cbv_update _ _ _ _ (fapply f _) _ _ => rank f | _ => 0 end.
Lemma fapplies_rec_PPO t t': In t (fapplies_in_term t') -> clos_refl PPO t t'.
induction t' as [ | c lt' IH | f lt' IH ] using term_ind2; intros t Hin.
destruct Hin as ( t' & Hint' & Hint ).
destruct (IH t' Hint' t Hint) as [ Hppo | Heq ].
destruct Hin as ( t' & Hint' & Hint ).
destruct (IH t' Hint' t Hint) as [ Hppo | Heq ].
Lemma PPO_value_is_value t v : PPO t v -> term_value v -> term_value t.
induction v as [ | c lv IH | ] using term_ind2; intros t Hppo Hvalv; [ inversion Hppo | idtac | inversion Hvalv ].
inversion Hppo as [ Ba Bb Bc Hin Be Bf | | Ba s Bc Bd Hin Hppos Bg Bh | | | | ]; subst.
apply andl_in with (l := map (@term_value _ _ _) lv); trivial.
apply andl_in with (l := map (@term_value _ _ _) lv); trivial.
Lemma PPO_activation_le_rank f1 lt1 f2 lv2 : PPO (fapply f1 lt1) (fapply f2 (map (@term_from_value _ _ _) lv2)) -> rank f1 <= rank f2.
remember (term_size (fapply f1 lt1) + term_size (fapply f2 (map (@term_from_value variable function constructor) lv2))) as whole_size eqn: Hsize.
revert f1 lt1 f2 lv2 Hsize.
induction whole_size as [ whole_size IH ] using lt_wf_ind.
intros f1 lt1 f2 lv2 Hsize Hppo.
inversion Hppo as [ | Ba Bb Bc Hin Be Bf | | Ba v Bc Bd Hin Hpposub Bh Bi | | | ]; subst.
apply in_map_iff in Hin; destruct Hin as (v & Heqv & Hv).
apply in_map_iff in Hin; destruct Hin as (v' & Heqv' & Hv').
Lemma PPO_pattern_le_rank f1 lt1 f2 lp2 : PPO (fapply f1 lt1) (fapply f2 (map (@term_from_pattern _ _ _) lp2)) -> rank f1 <= rank f2.
remember (term_size (fapply f1 lt1) + term_size (fapply f2 (map (@term_from_pattern variable function constructor) lp2))) as whole_size eqn: Hsize.
revert f1 lt1 f2 lp2 Hsize.
induction whole_size as [ whole_size IH ] using lt_wf_ind.
intros f1 lt1 f2 lv2 Hsize Hppo.
inversion Hppo as [ | Ba Bb Bc Hin Be Bf | | Ba v Bc Bd Hin Hpposub Bh Bi | | | ]; subst.
apply in_map_iff in Hin; destruct Hin as (v & Heqv & Hv).
apply in_map_iff in Hin; destruct Hin as (v' & Heqv' & Hv').

Lemma subfapplies_activation_le_rank i s p c1 f lt c2 v f' lt' : let proof_tree := cbv_update i s p c1 (fapply f lt) c2 v in PPO_prog -> wf proof_tree -> In (fapply f' lt') (fapplies_in_term (proj_left p)) -> rank f' <= rank f.
assert (PPO (fapply f' lt') (fapply f lt)) as Hppo.
apply (PPO_rule_instance i s p c1 (fapply f lt) c2 v); assumption.
clear i p c1 f c2 v f' lt' proof_tree Hppoprog Hin Hppo.
revert lp Heqlt; induction lt as [ | t lt IH ]; intros lp Heqlt; constructor; rewrite map_map in Heqlt; destruct lp as [ | p lp ]; [ discriminate | idtac | discriminate | idtac ].
clear i s p c1 c2 v proof_tree Hppoprog Hwf Hin.
inversion Hppo as [ | | | Ba t Bc Bd Hin Hppot Bg Bh | | | ]; subst.

Lemma le_rank_first_activation i s p c1 t c2 v p' : let proof_tree := cbv_update i s p c1 t c2 v in PPO_prog -> wf proof_tree -> In p' (first_activations proof_tree) -> activation_rank p' <= activation_rank proof_tree.
apply Forall2_In_l with (x:= p') in Hfor2 as (t' & Hinfapp & Hfor2); trivial.
assert (exists f' lt', t' = fapply f' lt') as (f' & lt' & Heqt').
apply fapplies_in_term_are_fapplies with (t2 := proj_left p); tauto.
apply wf_InCBV_wf with (proof_tree := proof_tree); try assumption.
destruct p' as [ | | i' s' p'' c1' t'' c2' v'' | ] ; simpl; try apply le_0_n.
generalize Hwf; intros Hwf'; simpl in Hwf'.
destruct t as [ | | f lt ]; try tauto.
apply (@subfapplies_activation_le_rank i s p c1 f lt c2 v f' lt'); tauto.

Lemma PPO_first_activations i s p c1 t c2 v p' : let proof_tree := cbv_update i s p c1 t c2 v in PPO_prog -> wf proof_tree -> In p' (first_activations proof_tree) -> PPO (proj_left p') (proj_left proof_tree).
destruct t as [ | | f lv ]; try (simpl in H_wf; tauto).
intros H_rank; apply le_rank_first_activation in H_rank; trivial.
assert ( exists f' lv', proj_left p' = fapply f' lv' ) as H_p'_fapply.
destruct H_p' as (i' & s' & p'' & c1' & t' & c2' & v' & Heqp').
destruct t' as [ | | f'' lt'' ] ; try tauto.
destruct p' as [ | | i' s' p'' c1' t' c2' v'| ]; try (apply activation_is_function in H_p'; repeat match goal with | H : exists _, _ |- _ => destruct H end; discriminate).
apply in_map_iff in Hin; destruct Hin as (v''' & Heqv'' & Hin).
generalize H_wf; intros Hresidues; apply first_activations_residues_activation in Hresidues; try assumption.
generalize H_p'; intros Hin; apply incl_first_activations_semi in Hin.
apply Forall2_In_l with (x := p') in Hresidues; [ clear Hin | assumption ].
destruct t as [ | | f'' lt ]; try tauto.
destruct Hresidues as [ Heqf Hlooklt ]; subst f''.

Lemma PPO_activations i s p c1 t c2 v p' : let proof_tree := cbv_update i s p c1 t c2 v in PPO_prog -> wf proof_tree -> In p' (activations proof_tree) -> p' = proof_tree \/ PPO (proj_left p') (proj_left proof_tree).

destruct H as [ Heq | Hppo ]; [ subst; right; trivial | left; assumption ].
apply activations_wf with (proof_tree := proof_tree); try assumption.

Lemma same_rank_same_prod vv ff cc lt ls rk rk': (forall t s, In t lt -> In s ls -> (forall f, In f (functions_of_term t) -> rk f = rk' f) -> (forall f, In f (functions_of_term s) -> rk f = rk' f) -> PPO rk t s -> PPO rk' t s) -> (forall f, In f (flat_map (@functions_of_term vv ff cc) lt) -> rk f = rk' f) -> (forall f, In f (flat_map (@functions_of_term _ _ _) ls) -> rk f = rk' f) -> product (PPO rk) lt ls -> product (PPO rk') lt ls.

Lemma same_rank_same_ppo vv ff cc (t : term vv ff cc) s rk rk': (forall f, In f (functions_of_term t) -> rk f = rk' f) -> (forall f, In f (functions_of_term s) -> rk f = rk' f) -> PPO rk t s -> PPO rk' t s.

apply IH with (m:=term_size t + term_size s); auto.

Lemma same_rank_same_ppo_rule vv ff cc f lp (t : term vv ff cc) rk rk': rk f = rk' f -> (forall g, g ∈ (functions_of_term t) -> rk g = rk' g) -> PPO rk t (fapply f (map (@term_from_pattern _ _ _) lp)) -> PPO rk' t (fapply f (map (@term_from_pattern _ _ _) lp)).

Ltac ppo variable_eq_dec function_eq_dec constructor_eq_dec := match goal with | |- PPO ?rk ?t1 ?t2 => let t := eval compute in (@PPO_dec _ _ _ variable_eq_dec function_eq_dec constructor_eq_dec rk t1 t2) in match t with | left ?H => try exact H | _ => let t := constr:(pair t1 t2) in idtac t end end.
